It does not include equity (stock) compensation, cash value of retirement benefits, or the value of other non-cash benefits (e.g. healthcare). ) C$18,551 - C$27,011 Country: Canada | Currency: CAD | Updated: 7 Jul 2012 | Individuals Reporting: 132

People with the job title Barista typically fall into one of the following PayScale standard occupations. Food Preparation Workers Perform a variety of food preparation duties other than cooking, such as preparing cold foods and shellfish, slicing meat, and brewing coffee or tea.
